Actions: Apply the rule only if the following conditions are met (leave blank for all products)
折扣方式: 仅在以下条件下应用该规则(留空则对全部商品生效)

Actions: Apply the rule only to cart items matching the following conditions (leave blank for all items)
折扣方式: 仅当购物车中的商品符合以下条件时应用该规则(留空则对全部商品生效)

Actions: Apply the rule to cart items matching the following conditions
折扣方式: 如购物车中的商品符合以下条件可应用该规则

Actions: Buy X get Y free (discount amount is Y)
By Percentage of the Original Price

折扣方式: 买满多少个商品可享受优惠

Actions: Fixed amount discount for whole cart
折扣方式: 固定金额优惠用于整个购物车

Actions: Maximum Qty Discount is Applied to

折扣方式: 优先级(数字越小优先级越高)
购物车内单个商品总额

Actions: The page you are trying to save no longer exists
To Percentage of the Original Price
Unable to find a page to delete
折扣方式: 无法找到要删除的页面

Actions: Update prices using the following information
折扣方式: 根据以下规则更新价格

Actions: Update Prices Using the Following Information
折扣方式: 按照以下规则更新价格
每位顾客可使用的次数
每张优惠券可使用的次数

Actions: If you select and save the rule you will be able to generate multiple coupon codes."如果您选择此项并保存规则将自动生成多个优惠券编号。
Maximum Qty Discount is Applied To
折扣方式: 购物车中享受优惠的最大商品数
优惠价格是否包括运费

Actions: Default Rule Label for All Store Views
折扣方式: 所有商店界面默认标签

Actions: If an item is %s in the cart with %s of these conditions true:
折扣方式: 如果购物车中 %s 以下商品，并且以下条件 %s 成立:

Actions: If %s %s %s for a subselection of items in cart matching %s of these conditions:
折扣方式: 如果购物车有 %s %s %s 个商品满足下列条件的 %s:
不包括前缀、后缀和分隔符。
